anya-e1102n2:3: Saṅgho ca dullabho loke, sappurisāti dullabhā”ti.
anya-e1102n2:4_0: Imissā gāthāya saṁvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha imasmiṁ sattaloke okāsaloke vā sabbaññusammāsambuddho
anya-e1102n2:4_1: dullabhova tathā hesa loko saṅkhāraloko, sattaloko, okāsalokoti tippabhedo hoti tesaṁ
anya-e1102n2:4_2: sampattivipatti ca evaṁ veditabbā tattha lujjati palujjatīti lokoti vacanatthena
anya-e1102n2:4_3: sattaloko veditabbo. Lokiyanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha sattanikāyāti vacanatthena okāsaloko
anya-e1102n2:4_4: veditabbo. Tathā hesa sattā avakasanti etthātiokāsoti vuccati so bhūmivasena apāyabhūmi,
anya-e1102n2:4_5: kāmasugatibhūmi, rūpāvacarabhūmi, arūpāvacarabhūmiceti catubbidhā hoti. Tattha nirayaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:4_6: tiracchānayoni, pettivisayo, asurakāyo, ti catasso apāyabhūmi nāma. Manussā, cātumahārājikā,
anya-e1102n2:4_7: tāvatiṁsā, yāmā, tusitā, nimmānarati, paranimmitavasavattī ceti sattavidhā hoti kāmasugatibhūmi
anya-e1102n2:4_8: sāpanāyaṁ ekādasavidhāpi kāmataṇhā avacarati etthāti vacanatthena kāmāvacarabhūmi
anya-e1102n2:4_9: nāma. Brahmapārisajjā, brahmapurohitā, mahābrahmā ca paṭhamajjhānabhūmi idaṁ agginā
anya-e1102n2:4_10: pariggahitaṭṭhānaṁ. Parittābhā, appamāṇābhā, ābhassarā ca dutiyajjhānabhūmi idaṁ
anya-e1102n2:4_11: āpena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṁ. Parittasubhā, appamāṇasubhā, subhakiṇhā ca tatiyajjhānabhūmi
anya-e1102n2:4_12: idaṁ vātena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṁ, tesaṁ vipattiṁ parato vaṇṇayissāma. Vehapphalā, asaññasattā,
anya-e1102n2:4_13: suddhāvāsā ca catutthajjhānabhūmiceti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti. Avihā, atappā,
anya-e1102n2:4_14: sudassā, sudassī, akaniṭṭhāceti suddhāvāsabhūmi pañcavidhā hoti. Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi,
anya-e1102n2:4_16: hoti arūpabhūmi. Ettāvatā ekatiṁsappabhedāpi bhūmi avakasanti ettha sattanikāyāti
anya-e1102n2:4_17: vacanatthena okāsoti vuccati. Tattha aṭṭha mahānirayāni apāyabhūmi nāma. Tiracchānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:4_18: pettivisayo asurakāyoti imesaṁ visuṁ bhūmi nāma natthi, manussabhūmiyaṁyeva yattha
anya-e1102n2:4_19: katthaci araññavanapatthādīsu nibaddhavāsaṁ vasanti soyeva padeso tesaṁ bhūmi. Manussabhūmito
anya-e1102n2:4_21: Tatupari dvitālīsasahassayojanaṁ sinerumatthakaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhūmi. Tatupari dvetālīsasahassayojanaṁ
anya-e1102n2:4_22: ṭhānaṁ yāmānaṁ bhūmi. Iminā nayena yāva vasavattibhūmi dvitālīsasahassayojane tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n2:4_23: tasmā manussabhūmito yāva vasavattibhūmi dvesahassānipañcana hutāni duvesatasahassāni
anya-e1102n2:8: Gaṇanā nāma bhūmīsu, saṅkhyā evaṁ pakāsitā”ti.
anya-e1102n2:9_0: Tatupari brahmapārisajjādayo tayo brahmuno pañcapaññāsasatasahassa aṭṭhasahassayojane
anya-e1102n2:9_1: samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Dutiyatatiyabhūmībrahmunopi tappamāṇesu samatalesu tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n2:9_2: Catutthabhūmiyaṁ pana vehapphalaasaññasattā tappamāṇe samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Tatuparisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo
anya-e1102n2:9_3: taṁtaṁ pamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti. Catassopi arūpabhūmiyo tappamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari
anya-e1102n2:9_4: tiṭṭhanti. Ettāvatā ca manussabhūmito yāva bhavaggā yojanānaṁ sattakoṭi ca aṭṭhārasalakkhā
anya-e1102n2:9_5: ca pañcanahutāni ca chasahassāni ca honti tenetaṁ vuccati porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n2:24: Esā ca vicāraṇā ṭīkā cariyamatena katā;
anya-e1102n2:27: Tāva sahassadhā loke, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti.
anya-e1102n2:28_0: Vuttaṁ. Etthantare sattā tiṭṭhanti, tesaṁ vitthāro apubbaṁ katvā kathetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e1102n2:28_1: na vakkhāma imasmiṁ sattaloke okāsaloke ca sabbaññusammāsambuddhova dullabho, tathā
anya-e1102n2:28_2: hi cattāro buddhā anubuddho, sāvakabuddho, paccekabuddho, sammāsambuddhoti. Tattha
anya-e1102n2:28_3: bahussutaṁ bhikkhuṁ pasaṁsantena ca na so tumhākaṁ sāvako nāma, buddhonāmesa cundāti
anya-e1102n2:29: Dhammakāyo yato satthā, dhammo satthukāyo mato;
anya-e1102n2:31_0: Vutte puthujjanopi upacāravasena vācanāmaggassa bodhattā anubuddho nāma. Ariyasāvako
anya-e1102n2:31_1: pana parato yosavasena cattāri saccāni bujjhati bujjhanamattameva vāti vacanatthena
anya-e1102n2:31_2: bujjhanasabhāvattā sāvakabuddho nāma. Yo pana khaggavisāṇakappo sayambhūñāṇena anaññabodhako
anya-e1102n2:31_3: hutvā sāmaṁ bujjhanatthena paccekabujjhattā paccekabuddho nāma. Sambuddhotipi etasseva
anya-e1102n2:31_4: nāmaṁ. Yo pana saṅkhatāsaṅkhatappabhedaṁ sakalampi dhammajātaṁ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhavasena
anya-e1102n2:31_5: sammā pakārena sayaṁ pacitupāramitāsayambhūtena sayambhūñāṇena sayameva anaññabodhito
anya-e1102n2:31_6: hutvā savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṁ vigato dinakarakiraṇasamāgamena paramarucirasirīsobhaggappattiyā
anya-e1102n2:31_8: sabbadhamme bujjhi abujjhi aññāsīti sammāsambuddho, bhagavā, sova loke dullabho paccekasambuddhānampi
anya-e1102n2:31_9: hi ekasmiṁ kāle satasahassādivasena ekato pavattattā te dullabhāpi anacchariyajātattā
anya-e1102n2:31_10: paresaṁ maggaphalādhigamāya upanissayarahitattā ca sammāsambuddhova loke dullabho,
anya-e1102n2:32_0: Kathaṁ lokassa vipatti veditabbā tathā hesa loko vinassamāno tejenapi āpenapi vāyunāpi
anya-e1102n2:32_1: vinassati. Tassa vitthāro visuddhimaggādīsu vuccamānopi kesañci puggalānaṁ matena
anya-e1102n2:32_2: micchāgāhattā brahmūnaṁ āyunā minitepi asamānaṁ saṁvaṭṭasīmāpi viruddhā, tasmā tesaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_3: vādaṁ apanetvā ganthato samānetvā vakkhāma. Tattha cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni
anya-e1102n2:32_4: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni saṁvaṭṭo, saṁvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo, vaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti. Tayo saṁvaṭṭā
anya-e1102n2:32_5: āposaṁvaṭṭo, tejosaṁvaṭṭo, vāyosaṁvaṭṭo. Tisso saṁvaṭṭasīmā ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā,
anya-e1102n2:32_6: vehapphalāti. Ayamettha uddeso. Tattha saṁvaṭṭo nāma parihāyamāno kappo. Tena saṁvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīpi
anya-e1102n2:32_7: gahito hoti, taṁ mūlakattā. Vaḍḍhayamāno vivaṭṭakappo nāma. Tena vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīpi
anya-e1102n2:32_8: gahito taṁ mūlakattā. Tattha saṁvaṭṭoti vināso. Yadā kappo vinassamāno tejena saṁvaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n2:32_9: ābhassarato heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānabhūmi agginā dayhati. Yadā āpena saṁvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato
anya-e1102n2:32_10: heṭṭhā yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakena vilīyati. Yadā vāyunā saṁvaṭṭati, vehapphalato
anya-e1102n2:32_11: heṭṭhā yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmi vātena saṁvaṭṭati. Vitthārato pana jātikhetta āṇākhettavisayakhettavasena
anya-e1102n2:32_12: tiṇṇaṁ buddhakhettānaṁ āṇākhettaṁ vinassati. Tasmiṁ vinaṭṭhe jātikhettampi vinassateva.
anya-e1102n2:32_13: Tattha jātikhettaṁ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṁ hoti. Taṁ tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇaāyusaṅkhārossajjanādikālesupi
anya-e1102n2:32_14: kampati. Āṇākhettaṁ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṁ. Yattha ratanasuttaṁ khandhaparittaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_15: dhajaggaparittaṁ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṁ moraparittanti imesaṁ parittānaṁ ānubhāvo pavattati.
anya-e1102n2:32_16: Visayakhettaṁ anantaṁ aparimāṇaṁ. Tattha jātikhettaāṇākhettāvasena dve khettāni ekato
anya-e1102n2:32_17: vinassanti. Saṇṭhahantampi ekato saṇṭhahati. Tassa vināsoca saṇṭhahantañca evaṁ veditabbaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_18: yasmiṁ samaye kappo agginā nassati, tadā ādito kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā
anya-e1102n2:32_19: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṁ ekameghavassaṁ vasi, tuṭṭhā manussā bījāni vappenti, sassesu
anya-e1102n2:32_20: gokhāyitamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṁ viravanto ekabindupi na patati. Yadā pacchinnameva
anya-e1102n2:32_21: hoti tadā vassūpajīvino sattā kālaṁ katvā parittābhesu brahmabhūmīsu uppajjanti puññaphalūpajīvinopi
anya-e1102n2:32_22: devatā tattheva brahmaloke uppajjanti, evaṁ dīghassa addhuno accayena tattha tattha
anya-e1102n2:32_23: udakaṁ parikkhayaṁ gacchati, macchakacchapādi udakanissitā pāṇā kālaṁ katvā manussadevalokesu
anya-e1102n2:32_24: nibbattitvā jhānaṁ uppādetvā brahmaloke nibbattanti. Nerayikasattāpi sattamasūriyapātubhāvā
anya-e1102n2:32_25: vinassanti, tepi devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena brahmaloke uppajjanti, tadā hi lokabyūhā
anya-e1102n2:32_26: nāma kāmāvacaradevā ukkhittasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi muñcamānā
anya-e1102n2:32_27: rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṁ ārocenti
anya-e1102n2:32_28: “mārisā bho ito vassasata sahassaccayena kappavuṭṭhānaṁ bhavissati ayaṁ loko vinassissati
anya-e1102n2:32_29: mahāsamuddopisussissati ayañca mahāpathavī sinerupabbatarājā ḍayhissati vinassissati
anya-e1102n2:32_30: yāvabrahmalokā vināso bhavissati mettaṁ mārisā bhāvetha. Karuṇaṁ, muditaṁ, upekkhaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_31: mārisā bhāvetha mātaraṁ upaṭṭhahatha, pitaraṁ upaṭṭhahatha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino hothā”ti.
anya-e1102n2:32_32: Tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṁvegajātā aññamaññaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_33: muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti. Tattha sudhābhojanaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_34: bhuñjitvā vāyo parikammaṁ katvā jhānaṁ paṭilabhanti, evaṁ nerayikasattāpi aparāpariyakammena
anya-e1102n2:32_35: devalokaṁ nibbattanti. Ye pana niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā tesaṁ kammassa aparikkhayā aññacakkavāḷesu
anya-e1102n2:32_36: attano kammānurūpaṁ vipākamanubhonti. Teneva ahosikamme micchādiṭṭhivasena akattabbaṁ
anya-e1102n2:32_37: nāma pāpaṁ natthi, yato saṁsārakhāṇubhāvova nāma hotīti āha “diṭṭhi paramāni bhikkhave
anya-e1102n2:32_38: vajjānī”ti. “Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahitopi saṁsaranto satto nāma natthī”ti vuttattā.
anya-e1102n2:32_40: bhavato vuṭṭhānaṁ nāma bhaveyyāti amhākaṁ khanti. Evaṁ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena
anya-e1102n2:32_41: sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti. Vassupacchedato pana uddhaṁ dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e1102n2:32_42: dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati. Pātubhūte ca tasmiṁ neva rattiparicchedo, na divā paricchedo
anya-e1102n2:32_43: paññāyati, eko sūriyo uṭṭheti, eko sūriyo atthaṁ gacchati. Avicchinnasūriyasantāpova loko hoti.
anya-e1102n2:33_0: Pakatisūriye sūriyadevaputto atthi kappavināsakasūriye pana natthi. Pakatisūriyobhāsena
anya-e1102n2:33_1: ākāse valāhakā dhūmasikhāpi caranti. Kappavināsakasūriyobhāsena vigatadhūmavalāhakaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_2: ādāsamaṇḍalaṁ viya nimmalaṁ hoti nabhaṁ ṭhapetvā gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū, aciravatī,
anya-e1102n2:33_3: mahīti, imā pañca mahānadiyo ṭhapetvā avasesapañcasatakunnadīādīsu udakaṁ sussati
anya-e1102n2:33_4: tato dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati tasmiṁ pātubhūte pañca mahānadiyopi
anya-e1102n2:33_5: sussanti. Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā
anya-e1102n2:33_6: himavatī mahānadīnaṁ pabhavā sīhapatano, haṁsapatano, mandākinī, kaṇṇamuṇḍako, rathakāradaho,
anya-e1102n2:33_7: anotattadaho, chaddantadaho, kuṇāladahoti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti. Tato dīghassa
anya-e1102n2:33_8: addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamuddo
anya-e1102n2:33_9: aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṁ na saṇṭhāti. Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho
anya-e1102n2:33_10: sūriyo pātubhavati, yasmiṁ pātubhāve sakalacakkavāḷaṁ ekadhūmaṁ hoti, pariyādinnasinehadhūmena
anya-e1102n2:33_11: yathā ca evaṁ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷampi. Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo
anya-e1102n2:33_12: sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṁ ekajālaṁ hoti saddhiṁ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi
anya-e1102n2:33_13: yojanasatikādibhedā sinerukūṭāni palujjitvā ākāseyeva antaradhāyanti. Sāpi aggijālā
anya-e1102n2:33_14: uṭṭhahitvā cātumahārājike gaṇhāti, tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_15: gaṇhāti etenūpāyena yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmi gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā
anya-e1102n2:33_16: ābhassare āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Sā yāva aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṁ atthi, tāva nanibbāyi.
anya-e1102n2:33_17: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā
anya-e1102n2:33_18: nibbāyi. Heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro. Evaṁ kappavināsakamahāmeghato
anya-e1102n2:33_19: yāvajālaparicchedā saṁvaṭṭo nāma ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ nāma. Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e1102n2:33_20: mahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṁ sukhumaṁ vassati. Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi
anya-e1102n2:33_21: dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaḍaḍḍhaṭṭhānaṁ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
anya-e1102n2:33_22: Taṁ udakaṁ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṁ karoti. Parivaṭumaṁ paduminipatte
anya-e1102n2:33_24: sampattimahāmegho, idaṁ saṁvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī nāma, dutiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ nāma. Kathaṁ tāva
anya-e1102n2:33_25: mahantaṁ udakarāsiṁ vāto ghanaṁ karotīti ce. Vivarasampadānato taṁ vā tena piṇḍiyamānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_26: ghanaṁ kariyamānaṁ parikkhayamānaṁ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati. Otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake pubbe
anya-e1102n2:33_28: paṭhamaṁ pātubhavati. Tato otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake catukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne anukkamena
anya-e1102n2:33_29: paranimmitavasavattī, nimmānaratī, tusitā, yāmāti cattāro kāmāvacaradevalokā pātubhavanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_30: Tato purimapathaviṭṭhānaṁ otiṇṇe pana udake balavavātā uppajjanti. Te taṁ pidahitadvāre
anya-e1102n2:33_31: dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṁ katvā nirujjhanti. Madhurodakaṁ parikkhayaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_32: gacchamānaṁ upari rasapathaviṁ samuṭṭhāpeti sā vaṇṇasampannāceva hoti gandharasasampannā
anya-e1102n2:33_33: ca, nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṁ viya tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā
anya-e1102n2:33_34: sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti. “Puññakkhayā vā”ti
anya-e1102n2:33_35: iminā brahmūnaṁ āyuparicchedaṁ appatvāva kammakkhayena maraṇaṁ viññāyati. Te honti
anya-e1102n2:33_36: sayaṁpabhā antalikkhacarā. Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṁ rasapathaviṁ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā
anya-e1102n2:33_37: āluppakāraṁ paribhuñjituṁ upakkamanti. Atha nesaṁ sayaṁ pabhā antaradhāyati, andhakāro
anya-e1102n2:33_38: hoti te andhakāraṁ disvā bhāyanti. Tato nesaṁ bhayaṁ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṁ janayantaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_39: paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṁ sūriyamaṇḍalaṁ vā pātubhavati. Te taṁ disvā “ālokaṁ paṭilabhimhā”ti
anya-e1102n2:33_40: haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṁ bhayaṁ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṁ janayanto uṭṭhito, tasmā sūriyo
anya-e1102n2:33_41: hotū”ti sūriyo tvevassa nāmaṁ karonti. Atha sūriye divasaṁ ālokaṁ katvā atthaṅgate
anya-e1102n2:33_42: “yampi ālokaṁ labhimhā, sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti. Tesaṁ evaṁ hoti “sādhuvatassa
anya-e1102n2:33_43: aññaṁ ālokaṁ labheyyāmā”ti. Tesaṁ cittaṁ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṁ candamaṇḍalaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_44: pātubhavati. Te taṁ disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṁ chandaṁ ñatvā
anya-e1102n2:33_45: viya uṭṭhito, tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṁ karonti. Tato pabhuti rattidivā
anya-e1102n2:33_46: paññāyanti. Anukkamena ca māsaddhamāsautusaṁvaccharā. Candimasūriyānaṁ pana pātubhūtadivaseyeva
anya-e1102n2:33_47: sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā pātubhavanti, te ca kho apubbaṁ acarimaṁ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva
anya-e1102n2:33_48: pātubhavanti. Kathaṁ yathānāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_49: Eke padesā thūpathūpā honti, eke ninnaninnā, eke samasamā evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne
anya-e1102n2:33_50: pabbatā honti, ninnaninnaṭṭhāne samuddā, samasamaṭṭhāne dīpāti evaṁ manussaloke saṇṭhite
anya-e1102n2:33_51: cātumahārājikā, tāvatiṁsāti dve kāmāvacaradevalokā pacchato pātubhavanti. Bhūmanissitā
anya-e1102n2:33_52: nāma hete dve devalokā. Evaṁ sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_53: vivaṭṭo nāma tatiyamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ nāma. Atha tesaṁ sattānaṁ rasapathaviṁ paribhuñjantānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_54: kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto, ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_55: Tesaṁ mānātimānapaccayā sāpi rasapathavī antaradhāyati. Bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati
anya-e1102n2:33_56: atha nesaṁ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati, patālatā pātubhavati, teneva nayena
anya-e1102n2:33_57: sāpi antaradhāyati. Akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
anya-e1102n2:33_58: Tato nesaṁ bhājanāni uppajjanti te sālī bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
anya-e1102n2:33_59: sayameva jālasikhā uṭṭhahitvā pacati. So hoti odano sumanajātipupphasadiso, na tassa
anya-e1102n2:33_60: sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṁ atthi. Yaṁyaṁ rasaṁ bhuñjitukāmā honti, taṁtaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_61: rasova hoti. Tesaṁ taṁ oḷārikaṁ āhāraṁ āharataṁ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṁ sañjāyati.
anya-e1102n2:33_62: Atha nesaṁ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti. Purisassa purisabhāvo,
anya-e1102n2:33_63: itthiyā itthibhāvo pātubhavati. Tatrasudaṁ itthī purisaṁ, puriso ca itthiṁ ativelaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_64: upanijjhāyati. Tesaṁ ativelaṁ upanijjhāyanabhāvā kāmapariḷāho uppajjati. Tato methunadhammaṁ
anya-e1102n2:33_65: paṭisevanti. Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa
anya-e1102n2:34_0: Te agāraṁ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_1: āpajjantā sannidhiṁ karonti. Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṁ pariyonaddhanti,
anya-e1102n2:34_2: lāyitaṭṭhānampi nappaṭivirūhati. Te sannipatitvā anuṭṭhunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā
anya-e1102n2:34_3: sattesu pātubhūtā, mayaṁ pubbe manomayā ahumhā”ti. Aggaññasutte vuttanayena vittharetabbaṁ.
anya-e1102n2:34_4: Tato mariyādaṁ ṭhapenti. Athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṁ adinnaṁ ādiyati. Taṁ dvikkhattuṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_5: paribhāsitvā tatiyavāre leḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti. Te evaṁ adinnādānakalahamusāvādadaṇḍadānesu
anya-e1102n2:34_6: uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti, “yaṁnūna mayaṁ ekaṁ sattaṁ sammanneyyāma, yo no
anya-e1102n2:34_7: sammā khiyitabbaṁ khiyeyya, garahitabbaṁ garaheyya, pabbājetabbaṁ pabbājeyya, mayaṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_8: panassa sālīnaṁ bhāgaṁ anupadassāmā”ti. Evaṁ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_9: tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena tesu sattesu abhirūpataro
anya-e1102n2:34_10: ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṁ kātuṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_11: te taṁ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammaniṁsu. So tena mahājanena sammatotipi mahāsammato,
anya-e1102n2:34_12: khettānaṁ adhipatīti khattiyo, dhammena samena paresaṁ rañjetīti rājāti, tīhi nāmehi
anya-e1102n2:34_13: paññāyittha. Yañhi loke acchariyaṁ ṭhānaṁ bodhisattova tattha ādi purisoti evaṁ bodhisattaṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_14: ādiṁ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṁsu.
anya-e1102n2:34_15: Evaṁ candimasūriyapātu bhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho, idaṁ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī
anya-e1102n2:34_16: nāma catutthamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ nāma. Tenetaṁ vuccati megho jālaparicchinno saṁvaṭṭoti
anya-e1102n2:34_17: jālā meghaparicchinno saṁvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Meghā sūriyaparicchinno vivaṭṭoti
anya-e1102n2:34_18: vuccati. Sūriyā meghaparicchinno vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati. Cattāri imāni kappāni mahākappoti
anya-e1102n2:34_19: vuccati. Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappeyeva uppajjanti buddhādayoti. Tathā hi imasmiṁyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyiasaṅkhyayyakappe
anya-e1102n2:34_20: buddhapacceka buddhasāvakacakkavattino uppajjanti, na tīsu asaṅkhyeyyakappesu. Tañca
anya-e1102n2:34_21: kho asuññakappeyeva, na suññakappe. Tattha buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakacakkavattīhi
anya-e1102n2:34_22: puññavantapuggalehi asuññattā asuññakappo nāma. Tabbigamena suññakappo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n2:34_23: Tesupi asuññakappo pañcavidho hoti sārakappo, maṇḍakappo, varakappo, sāramaṇḍakappo,
anya-e1102n2:34_24: bhaddakappoti, tesu yasmiṁ kappe ekova buddho uppajjati, so sārakappo nāma. Yasmiṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_25: kappe dve buddhā uppajjanti, so maṇḍakappo nāma. Yasmiṁ kappe tayo uppajjanti, so
anya-e1102n2:34_26: varakappo nāma. Yasmiṁ kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjanti, so sāramaṇḍakappo nāma. Yasmiṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_27: kappe pañca buddhā uppajjanti, so bhaddakapponāma. Imāni pañcakappāniyeva saheva
anya-e1102n2:63: Te sabbepi sammāsambuddhe yāva arimetteyyā samodhānetvā
anya-e1102n2:69_0: Namassanagāthā pavattā sā ūnasaṅkhyāvaseneva katāva bhavitabbaṁ, tathā hi amhākaṁ
anya-e1102n2:69_1: bhagavā porāṇabrahmadevabuddhaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manasāva cintentassa
anya-e1102n2:69_2: sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni porāṇasakyagotamabuddhaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva majjhimadīpaṅkarā
anya-e1102n2:69_3: vācāmattena nava asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni. Majjhimadīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya yāva padumuttarabuddhā
anya-e1102n2:69_4: kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni. Padumuttarabuddhato yāva
anya-e1102n2:69_6: satta asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṁ sampiṇḍetvā ekasatasahassañca vīsati sahassañca pañcasahassāni
anya-e1102n2:69_7: ca honti. Porāṇasakyagotamamajjhimadīpaṅkarānamantare nava asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṁ sampiṇḍetvā
anya-e1102n2:69_8: tīṇisatasahassāni sattāsītisahassāni ca honti. Majjhimadīpaṅkarato yāva metteyyā
anya-e1102n2:69_9: aṭṭhavīsāti sabbaṁ samodhānetvā aṭṭhavīsañca dvādasasahassañca pañcasatasahassāni
anya-e1102n2:69_10: ca honti tasmā ūnasaṅkhyāti veditabbā. Paripuṇṇasaṅkhyāvasena icchamānehi cintetabbāva.
anya-e1102n2:72_0: Vuttesu vīsatiasaṅkhyeyyesu pavattaasaṅkhyeyyakappavaseneva katā. Atthato pana sārakappamaṇḍakappavarakappasāramaṇḍakappabhaddakappavasena
anya-e1102n2:72_1: pañcavidhāti veditabbā. Imāni pañcanāmāni buddhuppādakappeyeva labbhanti, anuppannakappe
anya-e1102n2:72_2: pana suññakappotveva nāmaṁ labbhati tathā hi kappasaṇṭhahanakāle sabbapaṭhamaṁ mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e1102n2:72_3: paduminigabbhā uppajjati. Sā yasmiṁ kāle eko buddho uppajjissati, eko paduminigabbho
anya-e1102n2:72_4: aṭṭhaparikkhārehi saha uppajjati. Taṁ disvā suddhāvāsabrahmuno nemittapāṭhakā arahanto
anya-e1102n2:72_5: imasmiṁ kappe eko buddho uppajjissatīti sañjātapītisomanassā hutvā aṭṭhaparikkhāre
anya-e1102n2:72_6: gahetvā brahmaloke ṭhapenti “yadā buddho uppajjissati, tadā dassāmā”ti. Evaṁ dve
anya-e1102n2:72_7: tayo cattāro pañca buddhā uppajjissanti, tadā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca paduminigabbhā
anya-e1102n2:72_8: aṭṭhaparikkhārehi saha uppajjanti. Tañca kho ekasmiṁ yeva nāḷekeka baddhā hutvā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n2:72_9: Evaṁ kappasaṇṭhahanakālato paṭṭhāyeva imāni pañca nāmāni labbhantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n2:72_10: Ettāvatā imasmiṁyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappe buddhādayo mahesakkhā puññavanto
anya-e1102n2:72_11: cakkavattirājāno uppajjanti, tathā āyukappantarakappānipi. Tattha āyukappo nāma tesaṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_12: tesaṁ sattānaṁ āyuparicchedo. Antarakappo nāma tattha sattharogadubbhikkhānaṁ aññatarasaṁvaṭṭanena
anya-e1102n2:72_14: paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappappamāṇesu sattesu pana adhammasamādānavasena
anya-e1102n2:72_15: kamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnamaññatarasaṁvaṭṭanena sattānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_16: vināsappatti yāva ayameko antarakappo. Evaṁ paricchinnaantarakappavasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappo
anya-e1102n2:72_17: eko asaṅkhyeyyakappo vīsati antarakappappamāṇoti apare vadanti. Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni
anya-e1102n2:72_18: eko mahākappo nāma. Evaṁ tejo saṁvaṭṭavasena tāva mahākappānaṁ antaraṁ aggināva vinassati.
anya-e1102n2:72_19: Yasmiṁ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati, tadā āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti
anya-e1102n2:72_20: pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṁ ayaṁ pana viseso yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo, evamidhapi
anya-e1102n2:72_21: kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti so ādito sukhumaṁ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi
anya-e1102n2:72_22: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṁ pūrento vassati. Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo
anya-e1102n2:72_23: vilīyanti taṁ udakaṁ vātena samantato dhāritaṁ pathavito yāva parittābhā appamāṇābhā
anya-e1102n2:72_24: ābhassarāti tayopi dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakaṁ gaṇhāti. Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā
anya-e1102n2:72_25: subha kiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati yāva aṇumattaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ atthi, tāva na vūpasamati.
anya-e1102n2:72_26: Udakānugataṁ pana sabbasaṅkhāragataṁ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasamati antaradhānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_27: gacchati, heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṁ vuttasadisameva.
anya-e1102n2:72_28: Kevalaṁ panidha otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake ābhassarabrahmalokaṁ ādiṁ katvā lokapātubhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n2:72_29: Subhakiṇhato cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti etthāpi kappavināsakamahāmeghato
anya-e1102n2:72_30: yāva kappavināsakaudakaparicchedo saṁvaṭṭo nāma paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyakappo nāmāti cattāriasaṅkhyeyyakappāni
anya-e1102n2:72_31: vuttasadisāni evaṁ satta mahākappāni sattakkhattuṁ agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame mahākappe
anya-e1102n2:72_32: udakenapi vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṁ, evaṁ sattasattamahākappo sattasattavāraṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_33: agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre āpena vilīyitvā anukkamena tesaṭṭhimahākappāni
anya-e1102n2:72_34: paripuṇṇāni tadā āpavāraṁ paṭibāhitvā catusaṭṭhime mahākappe vātena vinassati tadā
anya-e1102n2:72_35: ādito kappavināsakamahāvāto vuṭṭhahitvāti sabbaṁ pubbe vuttanayameva. Ayaṁ pana viseso
anya-e1102n2:72_36: yathā agginā vināsakappe dutiyasūriyo, evamidhāpi kappavināsanatthaṁ vāto samuṭṭhāti
anya-e1102n2:72_37: so paṭhamaṁ sukhumarajaṁ uṭṭhāpeti, tato thūlarajaṁ saṇharajaṁ sukhumavālikaṁ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti
anya-e1102n2:72_38: yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇepi visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkheca uṭṭhāpeti, te pathavito
anya-e1102n2:72_39: nabhamuggatā na puna patanti, tattheva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṁ gacchanti. Yathānukkamena
anya-e1102n2:72_40: heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṁ parivattetvā uddhaṁmūlaṁ katvā ākāse
anya-e1102n2:72_42: bhijjitvā te vegakkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṁ gacchanti cakkavāḷapabbatampi
anya-e1102n2:72_43: vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati te aññamaññaṁ ghaṭṭayantā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti
anya-e1102n2:72_44: eteneva bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke
anya-e1102n2:72_45: nāsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti. Tattha cakkavāḷā cakkavāḷehi, himavantā
anya-e1102n2:72_46: himavantehi, sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṁ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
anya-e1102n2:72_47: Pathavito yāva parittasubhā, appamāṇasubhā, subhaṇiṇhāti tayopi tatiyajjhānabhūmī
anya-e1102n2:72_48: vāto gaṇhāti tattha tayopi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphalaṁ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Evaṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_49: sabbaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ vināsetvā sayaṁ vinassati, heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko
anya-e1102n2:72_50: hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṁ vuttasadisaṁ. Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṁ ādiṁ katvā
anya-e1102n2:72_51: loko pātubhavati. Vehapphalato cavitvā subhakiṇhādīsu sattā nibbattanti, tatthakappavinā
anya-e1102n2:72_52: sakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakavātupacchedo, idaṁ saṁvaṭṭo nāma, paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_53: nāmāti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni eko mahākappo nāmāti sabbaṁ tejosaṁvaṭṭe vuttanayameva.
anya-e1102n2:74: “Satta satta gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n2:75: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
anya-e1102n2:78_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṁ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṁ sambhavo
anya-e1102n2:78_1: natthīti asaṅkhyeyya kappavasena tesaṁ āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo. Dutiyajjhānatalato
anya-e1102n2:78_2: paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo, na asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena.
anya-e1102n2:78_3: Yadi dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo siyā, kathaṁ
anya-e1102n2:78_4: ābhassarādīsu brahmūnaṁ aṭṭhamahākappādivasena āyu paripuṇṇaṁ siyā, tathā hi paṭhamajjhānatalaṁ
anya-e1102n2:78_5: sattasu vāresu agginā vinassati. Aṭṭhame vāre yāva ābhassarā udakena vinassati puna
anya-e1102n2:78_6: sattavāresu agginā paṭhamajjhānatalaṁ, puna aṭṭhamevāre udakena dutiyajjhānatalaṁ
anya-e1102n2:78_7: vinassatīti evaṁ aṭṭhame vāre āpavāraṁ paṭibāhitvā yāva subhakiṇhā vātena vinassati
anya-e1102n2:78_8: evaṁ catusaṭṭhi paripuṇṇā hotīti saccaṁ, heṭṭhāvivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena
anya-e1102n2:78_9: eko satta mahākappāni cāti aṭṭha kappāni ābhassarabrahmūnaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ hoti. Catusaṭṭhikappesupi
anya-e1102n2:78_10: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko te saṭṭhimahākappāni cāti catusaṭṭhikappāni
anya-e1102n2:78_11: subhakiṇhānaṁ brahmūnaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ hoti tena vuttaṁ porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n2:79: Satta satta’gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n2:80: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n2:84_1: vuttabhāvañca samatalabhāvepi seṭṭhabhūmittā paṭṭhānavasena vuttabhāvañca amaññitvā
anya-e1102n2:85: “Pañcabhūmi naṭṭhā aggi, aṭṭha bhūmi naṭṭhā dakā;
anya-e1102n2:86: Navabhūmi naṭṭhā vātā, lokanaṭṭhā tadā siyuṁ.
anya-e1102n2:87: Paṭhame aggi dvattiṁsa, dutiye ādi soḷasa;
anya-e1102n2:88: Dutiyabhūme majjhe aṭṭhamaṁ, taṁ chappaññāsa vārakaṁ.
anya-e1102n2:91_0: Vadanti tesaṁ vāde ābhassarato heṭṭhā pañcabhūmi agginaṭṭhā, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā
anya-e1102n2:91_1: aṭṭhabhūmi udakanaṭṭhāti vadanti. Samataladīpanatthaṁ sandehacchedanatthaṁ evaṁ gahitāti
anya-e1102n2:91_2: ekabhavapariyosānaṁ sandhāya paṭisandhibhavañcāti ādi vuttanti. Imissāpi atthaṁ duggahitena
anya-e1102n2:91_3: gahetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena sadisabhāvameva sandhāya vuttanti parikappenti so
anya-e1102n2:91_4: ayuttarūpo viya dissati ativiya micchāgāho ca hoti aggaññasuttavisuddhimaggādīhi
anya-e1102n2:91_5: virujjhanato saṁvaṭṭasīmāpi viruddhā tattha paṭhamajjhānatalaṁ upādāya agginā, dutiyajjhānatalaṁ
anya-e1102n2:91_6: upādāya udakena, catutthajjhānatalaṁ upādāya vātena vinassatīti vuttavacanenāpi virujjhateva
anya-e1102n2:91_8: attho gahetabbo. Aññathā “upari pabbatā devo vassatī”ti ettha viya ābhassarasubhakiṇhavehapphalānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:91_9: tena tena saṁvaṭṭena vināsopi na bhaveyya. Ayaṁ lokavipattiparicchedo. Evaṁ buddho
anya-e1102n2:91_10: ca dullabho loke ti imassa attho vuttoyeva.
